data.name: pegasus_core|Button_Name_DiveBomb_Button
data.tooltip: Divebombs a target location, dealing <d ref="duckiesHeroArchangelDiveBomb_DamageRadius.amount" style="Bold"/> area damage and slowing nearby enemies for <d ref="duckiesHeroArchangelDiveBomb_Debuff.modifiers[0].amount * (-1)"/>% for <d ref="duckiesHeroArchangelDiveBomb_Debuff.duration"/> seconds.
